snippet: The authorities arrested Bobby Joe Rogers, 41, on Thursday on federal charges of setting a fire on Sunday that gutted a Pensacola abortion clinic that has faced violence in the past.
lead_paragraph: The authorities arrested Bobby Joe Rogers, 41, on Thursday on federal charges of setting a fire on Sunday that gutted a Pensacola abortion clinic that has faced violence in the past.

headline.main: Florida: Man Held After Fire at Abortion Clinic
headline.print_headline: Florida: Man Held After Fire at Abortion Clinic
